snippet: An unfounded blog report claiming that Gov. Nikki R. Haley of South Carolina was about to be indicted was the latest lesson in the perils of the instant news culture.
abstract: Unfounded report on a little-known blog claiming that Gov Nikki R Haley of South Carolina was about to be indicted on tax fraud charges spreads from local political circles into national circulation, largely via Twitter, forcing Haley to defend herself against the false rumor; incident leaves news organizations facing a new round of questions about accountability and standards.
lead_paragraph: An unfounded blog report claiming that Gov. Nikki R. Haley of South Carolina was about to be indicted was the latest lesson in the perils of the instant news culture.

headline.seo: False Nikki Haley Twitter Report Spreads Fast
headline.main: A Lie Races Across Twitter Before the Truth Can Boot Up
headline.print_headline: A Lie Races On Twitter Before Truth Can Boot Up
